import CartActionTypes from'./cart.types';//payload is an optional argument, here no need causer of toggle
export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:CartActionTypes.TOOGLE_CART_HIDDEN};};export var addItemToCart=function addItemToCart(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};export var clearItemFromCart=function clearItemFromCart(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.CLEAR_ITEM,payload:item};};
